Function# AudioGetHostClockMinimumTimeDelta()

iOS 2.0+iPadOS 2.0+Mac Catalyst 13.1+macOS 10.0+

```
func AudioGetHostClockMinimumTimeDelta() -> UInt32
```

## [Return Value](/documentation/coreaudio/audiogethostclockminimumtimedelta()#return-value)

A UInt32 containing the smallest number of ticks that two succeeding values will ever differ.

## [Discussion](/documentation/coreaudio/audiogethostclockminimumtimedelta()#discussion)

Gets the smallest number of ticks that two succeeding values will ever differ. by.
